item.title: Complete PPSSPP Configuration Guide - PlayStation Portable Emulator
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Complete PPSSPP Configuration Guide - PlayStation Portable Emulator

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Learn how to configure PPSSPP for optimal PSP emulation. Complete guide with recommended settings and optimizations.

Published on 2025-09-09 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-09-09
